Pre-Game Insights: The Cubs are the favorite in this game, at -146, while the Rockies have +123 odds to upset.
The total is 10.5 runs for the contest.
Mike Toglia and the Colorado Rockies take the field on Sunday at Coors Field against Kyle Hendricks.
The Cubs have won 36, or 52.2%, of the 69 games they've played as favorites this season.

The Rockies have been underdogs in 145 games this season and have come away with the win 55 times (37.9%) in those contests.
This year, Colorado has won 43 of 111 games when listed as at least +123 or worse on the moneyline.
Post-Match Reflections: The final score was CHC 6, COL 2.
